Package org.krysalis.barcode4j.xalan

This package contains the Apache Xalan extension for creating barcodes in SVG format during XSL transformations.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
BarcodeExt This class is an Extension for Apache XML Xalan to generate SVG barcodes.
ElemWrappingConfiguration Implementation of the Avalon Configuration interface that wraps the not fully implemented DOM nodes coming from Xalan-J.
 

Package org.krysalis.barcode4j.xalan Description

This package contains the Apache Xalan extension for creating barcodes in SVG format during XSL transformations.

See the XSL-FO use case for information on how to use the extension.
